text:
Why Trump's trying to turn the conversation to #Obamagate:
"Most (54%) continue to say the government is doing a poor job preventing the spread of Covid-19...the President's numbers for handling the coronavirus outbreak have worsened (55% now disapprove)."
https://t.co/LeJv7s9gZd
